item.title: Katakana - Part 1
item.description: Hello Friends Chai Pilo.ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ If you want to learn Katakana let’s learn together. Here I’ll be having my own Katakana class and teaching Katakana in a way that’ll be easy for you to understand. This will be a series so if you like the way I teach make sure you get subscribed by bookmarking this site. Enough talk let’s start. 1. The AEIOU
